subject: Re: Email
preview: Hi Kayci and Shelly,  Thank you both for trusting us.   If anything else comes up, just give us a shout, we’re always happy to help.  Hope you have a great afternoon too!

full_threads.body:
Hi Kayci and Shelly,

Thank you both for trusting us.

If anything else comes up, just give us a shout, we’re always happy to help.

Hope you have a great afternoon too!

Success! Thanks everyone, appreciate the help.

Have a great afternoon.

Kind regards,

Kayci

Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
shellshockedmedia.com
Buy the book here
Listen on Audible here
(Time: 6mins)

Hi Shelly and Kayci,

Thanks so much for bearing with us!

The final verification code has now been set, so you’re all set to verify on your end whenever you’re ready.

Let us know if you need any help, we’re always happy to help.

959517 is your GoDaddy verification code to update the DNS records on shellshockedmedia[.]com.

Shelly Horton

Hi Kayci and Shelly,

Thank you so much

Just a quick heads-up: since the domain is managed through GoDaddy, we’ll need a separate verification code for each DNS record we add.

Thanks again for bearing with us, we’ll keep things moving as smoothly as we can!

I just got sent another one 880554

Shelly Horton

Listen on Audible here

005658

Thank you, what a team!

Kind regards,

Kayci

Hi Team,

Shelly has just sent this through.



Kayci Herring Online Business Manager

www.kayciellen.com.au

hello@kayciellen.com.auhello@kayciellen.com.au

Hi Kayci,

Thank you so much for sharing the DNS records.

When you have a moment, could you please share the 6-digit verification code?

Appreciate your help! Thank you so much

Hi Allie,

Could you please add the following DNS records to authenticate the email for Mailchimp:

CNAME1
Name: k2._domainkey
Value: dkim2.mcsv.net

CNAME2
Name: k3._domainkey
Value: dkim3.mcsv.net

TXT
Name: _dmarc
Value: v=DMARC1; p=none;

Kind regards,

Kayci

Hi Shelly,

No worries at all, thank you for letting us know.

Just let us know what DNS record you’d like us to add, we’re happy to take care of it for you.

If anything else comes up, just let us know, we’re always happy to help.

Oh Jesus that means it's me.

Sorry everyone.

Kayci I just got in. Can you call me in the next 45mins?

X

Shelly Horton
0404 868 463
shellshockedmedia.com
Buy the book here
Listen on Audible here
(Time: 15mins) + admin time+ research

Hi Kayci,

Thanks so much for reaching out and for the heads-up.

We’ve taken a look on our end and can confirm that we don’t manage the G Suite (now Google Workspace) setup for shellshockedmedia.com, so we’re not able to access or make changes to the info@ address directly.

If it turns out Lanter isn’t managing it either, would you be able to check if you or someone on your team might have access to the Google Admin Console? https://admin.google.com

If that login doesn’t work, it’s likely the account was originally set up by a different provider or admin. In that case, you may need to connect with whoever first configured it to regain access.

Let us know how you go. Happy to help however we can!

Hi Allie,

Wonderful thanks. I first need access to the info@shellshockedmedia.com to be able to add the domain to Mailchimp.

Kind regards,

Kayci

Hi Kayci and Shelly,

Thanks so much for sending through the verification code—we were able to access GoDaddy successfully.

@Kayci, when you have a moment, could you please send over the DNS record you'd like us to add? We’re happy to take care of it for you.

Let us know if there’s anything else you need in the meantime! Always happy to help

Did you ask for a Go Daddy verification code?

Here it is

Your GoDaddy verification code is 488982.
